title: Happy Tacos
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Beer/Wine, Guatemalan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Economical family restaurant close to the San Marcos boat dock. Several veggie choices including veggie tacos, pizzas, and burritos, some of which can be made vegan. Owners are sensitive to vegans will provide upon request. Offers espresso, brewed from locally sourced beans.
streetAddress: Approximately 50 meters up from the main boat dock, on the left
